plot: A modern-day allegory about a young girl who uses her wits, her charm, and the assistance of a new found friend to help her daddy solve a problem.
title: Junie's Leverage
plot_es: A modern-day allegory about a young girl who uses her wits, her charm, and the assistance of a new found friend to help her daddy solve a problem.
plot_en: A modern-day allegory about a young girl who uses her wits, her charm, and the assistance of a new found friend to help her daddy solve a problem.
